snippet.title: The Translyvania Adventure of Simon Quest - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX x Kinda Funny 2024
snippet.description: Check out gameplay from The Transylvania Adventure of Simon Quest in this latest trailer for the upcoming parody/homage platformer action game set in a dark 8-bit world. The trailer showcases combat, fishing, a peek at the map, exploration, giant enemies, and more. Rival Stan Helsing robbed Simon of fame by killing Count Dracula first! Reclaim your glory by resurrecting Dracula piece by piece and slaying the dark count yourself. The Transylvania Adventure of Simon Quest will be available on PC, Nintendo Switch, Xbox, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and PS4 (PlayStation 4).
